footer.disclaimer: All information is for reference only. Please verify yourself.
list.title: Listings
list.subtitle: Find your ideal rental with our student community.
list.empty: No listings yet. Be the first to publish!
brand.title: Student Housing Platform
brand.subtitle: Housing for International Students
brand.metaDesc: A platform providing real rental listings shared by and for international students.
home.heroDesc1: A truthful, reliable rental information sharing platform for students abroad.
home.heroDesc2: Help future students quickly find suitable housing and avoid information asymmetry.
home.features.trust.title: Trustworthy
home.features.trust.desc: All listings are verified by alumni to ensure accuracy and reliability.
home.features.community.title: Community Sharing
home.features.community.desc: Build a mutual-help community where students share experiences and support each other.
home.features.safety.title: Safe & Secure
home.features.safety.desc: We strictly protect user privacy and keep information under control to avoid leakage risks.
home.disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
home.disclaimer.p1: This platform only provides information sharing. All listing information is submitted by users. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information.
home.disclaimer.p2: Before renting, please visit the property in person, verify the details, and sign a formal contract with the landlord/agent. In case of disputes, this platform bears no legal responsibility.
form.description.placeholder: Describe room size, furnishings, transport, nearby facilities, etc.
photos.title: Listing photos
photos.upload.label: Upload photos
photos.upload.hint: Supports JPG/PNG, up to 10 photos. Max 5MB each.
submit.title: Submit a Listing
submit.subtitle: Help fellow students find suitable housing and build a supportive community.
submit.guide.title: Submission Guide
submit.guide.1.title: Detailed address
submit.guide.1.desc: Provide full street, city, and postal code.
submit.guide.2.title: Complete pricing
submit.guide.2.desc: Include monthly rent, deposit, and other fees.
submit.guide.3.title: Property details
submit.guide.4.title: High-quality photos
submit.guide.4.desc: Upload clear interior and exterior photos.
submit.guide.5.title: Contact (optional)
submit.guide.5.desc: Make it easy for others to reach you.
submit.guide.6.title: Accuracy matters
submit.guide.6.desc: Ensure info is accurate to avoid misleading others.
submit.success: Submitted successfully! Thank you for sharing.
api.init.usePost: Use POST to initialize R2 listings
api.submit.missingFields: Address, price, and contact are required
addressInput.notFoundHint: Try entering a more specific address
addressInput.clickMap: Click the map to select a location
addressInput.hint: Type to search or click the map. Powered by OpenStreetMap.
